Reviews.Title: “Affordable and nice! The indoor pool is so nice and warm.”
Reviews.Author: frizzell
Reviews.Content: arrive ozark mountain inn expecting arrival greeted nice staff found rate competitive paid clean indoor pool clean warm hot tub hot jacuzzi available jets breakfast typical continental definitely stay

Reviews.Content: surrounds smelled smoky nonsmoking noisy night children pool till 1045pm tired rundown premises breakfast ok continental staff appearance hygiene improving location recommend price range

Reviews.Title: “Good location, quiet, nice pool, bring your own pillow though”
